login.description: Sign in with your Notion account to create your personal coffee collection. Your data stays private in your workspace.

notion.title: Connect to Notion
notion.description: We'll create a coffee database in your Notion workspace. Here's what you need to do:
notion.step1: You'll be redirected to Notion to authorize the connection
notion.step2: When Notion shows you two options, select 'Use a template provided by the developer'. This will create your coffee database with the correct structure.
notion.step3: Click 'Allow access' to complete the connection
notion.tip: Don't worry - we only create a database for your coffee collection. We won't modify your other pages.
notion.errorDescription: We couldn't set up your coffee database because no pages were shared during authorization.
notion.errorExplanation: When you authorized the connection, no Notion pages were selected. We need access to at least one page to create your coffee database.
notion.fix1: Click 'Try Again' to restart the authorization
notion.fix2: When Notion shows 'Select pages', choose at least one page
